mapper.insert: insert into Robot_Tester_WorkInfo (RobotNo, TesterNum, Tester_IP, Status, TotalTest, PassNum, FailNum, FENum, SFCErrNum, RepairTime, Put_NG, FirstPS_NG, Put_OK, Date_Time, Station, Model) values (#{robotno,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{testernum,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{testerIp,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{totaltest,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{passnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{failnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fenum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sfcerrnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{repairtime,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{putNg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{firstpsNg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{putOk,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{station,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=NVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select RobotNo, TesterNum, Tester_IP, Status, TotalTest, PassNum, FailNum, FENum, SFCErrNum, RepairTime, Put_NG, FirstPS_NG, Put_OK, Date_Time, Station, Model from Robot_Tester_WorkInfo
